dialogue.string: 1�With the airships connecting Jeuno with the three nations, the flow of goods has become much more consistent. Nowadays, everything comes through Jeuno!
1�Of course, Jeuno is situated smack-dab in the middle of the three, so this town was destined to grow and prosper.
1�I think the airships are a subtle form of pressure on the other three nations. That way, Jeuno can maintain the current balance of power.
1�Nobody would want to upset the masters of such advanced technology, would they? Nope, can't blame Jeuno for keeping the secrets of airship-building to itself.
1� 's badge flashes brightly.
1�I've heard that the technology of Aht Urhgan has developed along quite different lines than that of Bastok.

1�Of course, airship technology has been our greatest achievement, but I've heard outlandish rumors about the Near East. One even says that they've created living creatures with their alchemy skills! Tales like that run chills down my spine.
1�Did you guys hear? This grown-up said ?[he/she] wanted 6????! Hahaha!
1�Hmm... Yeah, that kind of thing's known to happen. Well, you don't leave me much choice. I have an extra one, so I'll let you have it.
1�But I won't give it away for nothing. Let's see... I need something from Jeuno to take home, so get me  $???? and it's yours.
1�Wha... How'd you guess?
1�Well, at any rate... I'll trade you my 3???? for  $????. Better get moving before I change my mind!
1�Whoa, it's a real #????! Okay, here's your 3????. And don't come back saying you want to return it!
1�We're globetrotting for our stamp rally! I never rode on airships before. It was so awesome!
1�You know, stamp rallies are only for kids. Grown-ups can't play, only kids can!
1�Kids love the 3???? and stamp rallies more than anything! And don't you forget it!
1�I heard you can find  $???? somewhere around Castle Oztroja.
1� 's badge flashes brightly.
1�Surprise!
1�Karl's badge flashes brightly.
1�Jaha Amariyo's badge flashes brightly.
1�Buntz's badge flashes brightly.
1�I took a number and stood in line, but they ran out, right before my eyes.
1�Wait... You had two this whole time? Aww, you could've at least offered me one!
1�I wanted it, too. If I only had that, I wouldn't have had to...
1�I rode an airship here for the first time, and I feel rotten! Ugh... I wanna go home.
1�I used up all the barf baskets they had. How am I supposed to make it home?
1�Check it out!
1�Who cares? Even grown-ups want 6????.
1�Well, it's not like I have a choice! You are just going to give it to Melina, aren't you? Scoundrel!
1�You can't hide anything from a woman!
1�Wow! Jeuno's a nice town, just like the postcards! I wanna live here when I grow up.
1�Ta-da!
1�You're off to Delkfutt's Tower, eh? You be careful, now.
1�You're off to Delkfutt's Tower, eh?
1�Are you going to Delkfutt's Tower?That's right.No, I'm not.
1�It's so confusing with all the portals and trap doors in there. Ain't no walk in the park, ?[sonny/kiddo]!
1�But it's smooth sailing with this here 3????. I dug it up at the book fair the other day.
1�It's just another piece of paper to me, so... I know! I'll trade you  $???? for it! Yeah, I love antiquities.
1�Will you bring me  $?????I'll try.Not now.
1�Super! Hurry back with  $????! And be careful!
1�Oh yeah? Well, it's your loss, ?[pal/sister].
1�Oh? My mistake, then.
1�Look, just bring me  $????. And be careful, too.
1�Tread carefully, and don't forget to check the map!
1�Well, this is just super! Alrighty, here's the goods.
1�What? You still thinking about that antique ring?
1�Are you ready?You bet.Uh, give me a moment.
1�Very well. Let's see it!
1�Why, this is quite an old ring. And the years have not been kind! Look, I've found an inscription.
1�Hmm... No, I can't make it out. It's too much for the Goldsmiths' Guild. You'll need to bury it in perennial snow to wash away the filth!
1�Deep inside Xarcabard lies a snow untouched for a thousand years. Take your ring, bury it there to clean the grime, and come back here.
1�That's fine. I'm sure your antique would appreciate the privacy.
1�What, you have something you want appraised? I mean, seriously! These days everyone says they find treasures in the auction. Nonsense, all of it!
1�See, within antiques sleep spirits of the past! Search carefully or you'll awaken their slumber!
1�If you're ready, show me your item and I'll start the appraisal.
1�Take the ring to a person of respectable age in Chateau d'Oraguille. Can't give it a price till you know its value, as we say in the business!
1�Deep inside Xarcabard lies a snow untouched for a thousand years. Take your ring, bury it there to clean the grime, and come back here.
1�Well, look at this! Clean as a whistle! Now, let's see what we can see...
1�Say, this is written in the elder script of San d'Oria. It's a fine ring, but I wonder what it says...
1�I suggest you take it to someone of respectable age in Chateau d'Oraguille.
1�Can't give it a price till you know its value, as we say in the business!
1�It was quite some time ago now, but I saw this young Elvaan girl heading into that cave with a fishing rod in her hand.
1�When she came back, she told me some ??damn huge octopus?? had whipped the rod right out of her grasp...
1�Step right this way to entaru your Rent-a-Roomie!
1�Say, I can reserve a Rent-a-Roomie for you. All your stuff will be taken from your Moggie-Woggie House and brought here!
1�Do you want to move to Jeuno?Right away.Not now, thanks.
1�Very well. I've completed the necessary procedure-wedures! Make yourself at home in your home away from home! Hehehe!
1�Oh, okay. Fine! Be that way!
1�The flight bound for  [San d'Oria/Bastok/Windurst/Kazham] is now  [arriving/departing].

1�Once you go through customs, you'll have to pay to come back on board. Is that all right?
1�Hey, stop right there!
1�You are in possession of contraband! I'm sorry, but you'll have to surrender all prohibited goods!
1�Regulations also force me to temporarily revoke your airship privileges. Don't let this kind of thing happen again.

1�This is the departures exit. You can't go out this way. Try the next door, please.

1�I can't believe those boats without wings can fly. I'll never ride on such a thing, so I walk everywhere.
1�I'm sure they're a fine way to get around, but the whole concept seems fake to me.
1�I lost my ticket, and now I can't get on board. It takes so long to get a new one! I hope you never have to go through this.

1�Venture roll is a competitive game played with dice similar to those used by corsairs. The objective is to roll until your cumulative total comes as close to 11 as possible without going over.

1�Until you reach or go over 11, you may continue rolling (doubling up) as many times as the table time limit allows (
  ? [minute/minutes], Earth time).
1�In addition to doubling up, you may also decline to roll the dice and stay with your current total (hold fast).
1�If your total ever goes over 11, you will automatically lose the game, regardless of the totals of other players. Knowing the right time to hold fast is one of the keys to staying in the match.

1�Once all the players have held fast, the game is over and the results are announced. The player closest to 11 is declared the winner and receives all the gil in the pot (the original participation fees of all the players).

1�The synergy furnaces you see around town are provided as a public service by the Bastokan Institute of Synergy Research, to ensure that no synergist is ever far away from the tools of their trade.
1�The synergist must provide his or her own 3????, as well as any materials to be used in the synergy process.Synergy furnaces themselves may be used free of charge.
1�Needless to say, only one party may operate any given furnace at once.
1�Fortunately, there are multiple furnaces installed throughout town.If the furnace before you is already in use, please seek out an unused one elsewhere, or wait patiently for your turn.
1�You may think of synergy as an evolved form of synthesis.It is a discipline full of heretofore unimagined possibilities, but one which demands consummate skill from its practitioners.

1�Like synthesis, synergy involves combining materials according to a prescribed recipe to yield oft-spectacular results.The rub is that each synergy recipe also dictates a certain elemental balance that must be achieved for the procedure to be successful.

1�This balance is achieved through skillful infusion of combustible elemental crystals that we synergists call ??fewell.??To begin the synergy process, you'll have to feed the furnace with fewell and get those flames burning!
